version_id.description: A specific Version ID of the Dataset to retrieve.
version_id.title: Version ID

environment.description: Name of the Environment to retrieve a deployed Version from.
environment.title: Environment

include_datapoints.description: If set to `true`, include all Datapoints in the response. Defaults to `false`. Consider using the paginated List Datapoints endpoint instead.
include_datapoints.title: Include Datapoints
